name: Quonxy
key_relationships: mentor_of: Little Porn; works_with: Dylan; obsession: Pastor Garrett Purvis
notes: Daughter of The Mnemonist. Discovered Bible annotated with logical symbols May 6 1997. Invented think-switches concept.

name: Little Porn
family_connections: father: Roger Deavers; mother: Trisha Summers; brother: Jimmy

notes: 8-year-old prodigy. Created puzzle languages and LPN (Little Porn Base Nomenclature). Completed Escher puzzle at age 4.

name: Jackson
